page.title: 09Comparing the Villages
page.content: {Woodsetts,Shireoaks}and{Thorpe Salvin are all completely different villages. {Thorpe Salvin}probably has the most expensive houses in the three villages because they are large,old and attractive.If you lived in{Thorpe {Salvin}you might not choose to buy a house in{Shireoaks}because it is a{pit {village}and some of the houses are terraced.{Thorpe Salvin}is a small village with not many houses.It is surrounded by farmland.{Woodsetts}is not such a wealthy village,but some houses are expensive.There are more houses in{Woodsetts}than in{Thorpe {Salvin.}Most houses in{Woodsetts}are attractive and new.In{Shireoaks}many families may work at the{mine.}The {mine }is near the houses.
